description: QueryDataPolicy is the policy configuration for querying data.

^(disableExport)$.description: Disable data export in the SQL editor.

^(maximumResultRows)$.description:
The maximum number of rows to return.
 The default value is -1, means no limit.

^(maximumResultSize)$.description:
The maximum result size limit in bytes.
 The default value is 100MB, we will use the default value if the setting not exists, or the limit <= 0.

disable_export.description: Disable data export in the SQL editor.

maximum_result_rows.description:
The maximum number of rows to return.
 The default value is -1, means no limit.

maximum_result_size.description:
The maximum result size limit in bytes.
 The default value is 100MB, we will use the default value if the setting not exists, or the limit <= 0.

title: Query Data Policy
